p: Frequencies and percentages were calculated for dichotomous variables and median and interquartile range (IQR) were calculated for continuous variables. Pearsonâ€™s chi-square tests were used to assess if issues related to gender-based vulnerability were associated with injecting drugs among WWUD. Data were collected and managed using Research Electronic Data Capture (Redcap), and analyses were performed using R software (R Foundation, Vienna, Austria).
